body:
Comment 13: 
I should mention it seems to work in 32bit windows with <= 32bit args as well.

Perhaps 

type CallStack []byte // or a struct with a []byte and extra info
// handy funcs for creating a CallStack
func SyscallRaw(trap uintptr, args CallStack) (r1, r2 uintptr, err Errno)

where you setup the call stack outside of the function?
I got the next few days off (thanks D.C.)... I will test it if you guys think it is
worth attempting.
